1.text: Open up your pack of cards and tokens.

2.text: Divide the cards by color and arrange them in decks.

3.text: Deal 4 cards from each deck, leaving them face-up in rows.

4.text: Shuffle and deal the Noble Tiles.

5.text: Sort each token by color and put them at the bottom of the table.

6.text: Win the game by getting the most Prestige points.

7.text: Start with the youngest player and go clockwise around the table.

8.text: Choose from 4 different actions during your turn.

9.text: Take 3 different colored gems when you first start the game.

10.text: Take 2 gems of the same kind if there are more than 4 in the stack.

11.text: Purchase a development card using your tokens.

12.text: Reserve a development card if you can’t buy it yet.

13.text: Trade in gold tokens for any gems you need.

14.text: Collect a Noble card if you’ve gotten their attention.

15.text: Discard tokens if you have more than 10.

16.text: Begin the final round when someone reaches 15 Prestige points.

17.text: Tally up your Prestige points to find out who wins.
